titles.title: To amend section 377 of title 28, United States Code, to designate certain retired bankruptcy judges and magistrate judges as senior judges.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E559)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Intellectual Property and Judicial Administration.

bill.summary: 3/24/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to designate retired bankruptcy judges and magistrate judges who retire from office after attaining age 65 and serving at least 14 years in such capacities as senior judges.
